items.title: Orphan Care Training- Bring Me Hope
items.headline: www-bringmehope-org
objectives_summary: Volunteers attending the Bring Me Hope are required to complete this course before camp.  They will learn more about the children they will be serving, and how to be an effective translator at camp.  The children at camp all have a disability or attachment difficulties, so it is important to understand how that affects their behavior and how volunteers can help them have a great week at camp.

items.title: Resolve Conflict In 4 Easy Steps With The CALM Dialogue
items.headline: Conflict Resolution Made Easy
objectives_summary: Individuals enrolled in this class will learn a quick and easy conflict resolution technique.
Students will also learn effective communication skills.

items.title: Ignite Your Passion for Reading: Fall in Love with Books
items.headline: Discover books YOU love and learn how to find new bookish friends!
objectives_summary: You will feel inspired to find books you love and make the time to enjoy them.
You will know how to find amazing book recommendations and explore different genres.
You will be able to find and join communities of people that enjoy reading.

items.title: How You Can Help Your Local Community - 5 Amazing Examples
items.headline: You can benefit your community! Here are 5 examples of people who have made the difference in theirs to inspire you.
objectives_summary: Understand how one individual can make the difference in a local community
Realise that change starts with one person, and that one person can be them
Learn about some good causes, social enterprises and charities already happening in the UK

bypass the “thieves of time”;
